title: Gang of Yuusha - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Fantasy   Harem   Mature   Romance   Seinen
tags: Adapted to Manga   Antihero Protagonist   Aristocracy   Beastkin   Betrayal   Cold Protagonist   Criminals   Dark   Drugs   Dungeons   First-time Interc**rse   Former Hero   Heroes   Loli   Magic   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Organized Crime   Polygamy   Protagonist Strong from the Start   R-18   R*pe Victim Becomes Lover   R*pe   Ruthless Protagonist   Stockholm Syndrome   Summoning Magic   Sword And Magic
author: Nanairo Kasuga   七色春日
description:
Shouji, who was born in a poor family, had the qualities of a “yuusha”. 

However, he was passing his days as a sloth, drowning himself in alcohol and potions(drugs). While relying on only violence to make a living, he encountered a girl who is a talented alchemist, but also mired in debt. 

Potions created by this little girl were mind-blowing as it had the highest purity he had seen. It was a product that was worth loads. 

He was through with fame and honor. He no longer had the desire to only make money to live as his purpose. 

He felt it wouldn’t be so bad to smuggle those potions in the underground world of crime and drugs. 

Brewing this restorative item that gets people high, in search of dirty money and comrades for his gang, hanging onto the potions that let him loose, the mad “yuusha” challenged the demons who are hidden in this demi-world.>
